### Rubric: Final Interview
#### EMSE 4575: Exploratory Data Analysis, Spring 2021
#### 100 Total Points

You will be asked 10 questions; for each question, you will be assigned points based on this scale:

<div style="width:450px">

Points | Description
-------|---------------------------------------------------
10     | Answers immediately and correctly without hesitation
9      | Answers correctly after some initial struggles
8      | Answers mostly correct after some time
7      | Answers mostly correct after some time and some help
6      | Answers mostly correctly after _considerable_ help
5      | Poor or partial answer, even after considerable help
0      | Cannot answer even with considerable help

</div>
